DataElement.preferredName: Patient Checklist Complete And Registration Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the patient's checklist is completed and is eligible for registration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Checklist Complete And Registration Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A list of items required or things to be done or considered._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A list of items required or things to be done or considered.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient's checklist complete and are they eligible for registration?
